name: VersionWix
description: Applies a version to a Wix manifest based on the build number. Based on Microsoft sample from https://msdn.microsoft.com/Library/vs/alm/Build/overview
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder for Wix files, can be root as it will find all files recursively

inputs.name: File
inputs.label: Include file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of include file contaong the version

inputs.name: VersionNumber
inputs.label: Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to apply to files, can be extraced from the build name 'Build HelloWorld_00.00.00000.0' format

inputs.name: InjectVersion
inputs.label: Inject Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If True no regex processing will be done to the build number.

inputs.name: VersionRegex
inputs.label: Regex Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression filter build number from name.

inputs.name: FieldsToMatch
inputs.label: Version fields to match
inputs.helpMarkDown: The list of five field names that will be updated in the wxi file.

inputs.name: OutputVersion
inputs.label: Version number used variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The actual version number extracted and used from the build number.
